summary.span: 为 Web 和应用程序服务管理 ASP.NET Ajax 脚本库和脚本文件、局部页面呈现以及客户端代理类生成。

span.span: Manages ASP.NET Ajax script libraries and script files, partial-page rendering, and client proxy class generation for Web and application services.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [部分页呈现Partial-Page Rendering](#partial_page_rendering) - [结合使用 ScriptManager 控件和母版页、用户控件和其他子组件Using the ScriptManager Control with Master Pages, User Controls, and Other Child Components](#using_the_scriptmanager_control_with_master_pages__user_controls__and_other_child_components) - [脚本管理和注册Script Management and Registration](#script_management_and_registration) - [Web 服务引用Web Service References](#web_service_references) - [本地化Localization](#localization) - [错误处理Error Handling](#error_handling) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是 ASP.NET 中 Ajax 功能的核心。The control is central to Ajax functionality in ASP.NET. 控件管理页面上的所有 ASP.NET Ajax 资源。The control manages all ASP.NET Ajax resources on a page. 这包括将 Microsoft Ajax Library 脚本下载到浏览器并协调通过使用控件启用的部分页面更新 。This includes downloading Microsoft Ajax Library scripts to the browser and coordinating partial-page updates that are enabled by using controls. 此外， 控件使您能够执行以下操作：In addition, the control enables you to do the following: - 注册与部分页面更新兼容的脚本。Register script that is compatible with partial-page updates. 为了管理脚本和核心库之间的依赖关系，你注册的任何脚本都将加载到 Microsoft Ajax 库脚本之后。In order to manage dependencies between your script and the core library, any script that you register is loaded after the Microsoft Ajax Library script. - 指定发布或调试脚本是否发送到浏览器。Specify whether release or debug scripts are sent to the browser. - 通过向控件注册 Web 服务，提供对脚本中的 Web 服务方法的访问 。Provide access to Web service methods from script by registering Web services with the control. - 通过向控件注册这些服务，提供对客户端脚本中的 ASP.NET authentication、role 和 profile 应用程序服务的访问权限 。Provide access to ASP.NET authentication, role, and profile application services from client script by registering these services with the control. - 在浏览器中启用 ECMAScript (JavaScript) [日期](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/bb310850(v=vs.90))、 [数字](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/bb310835(v=vs.90))和 [字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/bb397472(v=vs.90)) 函数的特定于区域性的显示。Enable culture-specific display of ECMAScript (JavaScript) [Date](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/bb310850(v=vs.90)), [Number](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/bb310835(v=vs.90)), and [String](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/bb397472(v=vs.90)) functions in the browser. - 使用控件的属性来访问嵌入脚本文件或独立脚本文件的本地化资源 。Access localization resources for embedded script files or for stand-alone script files by using the property of the control. - 使用控件注册实现或接口的服务器控件， 以便呈现客户端组件和行为所需的脚本。Register server controls that implement the or interfaces with the control so that script required by client components and behaviors is rendered. ## 部分页呈现Partial-Page Rendering ASP.NET 页支持部分页面呈现的能力由以下因素控制：The ability of an ASP.NET page to support partial-page rendering is controlled by the following factors: - 控件的 属性必须 `true` (默认值) 。The control's property must be `true` (the default value). - 页面上必须至少有一个 控件。There must be at least one control on the page. - 属性必须 `true` (默认值) 。The property must be `true` (the default value). 如果 未显式设置属性，则其值基于浏览器功能。If the property is not set explicitly, its value is based on browser capabilities. 可以 在运行时或在页面事件发生之前重写属性的值 。You can override the value of the property at run time during or before the page's event. 如果在页面事件发生后尝试更改此属性 ，则 会引发异常。If you try to change this property after the page's event has occurred, an exception is thrown. 支持部分页面呈现时， 控件将呈现脚本以启用异步回发和部分页面更新。When partial-page rendering is supported, the control renders script to enable asynchronous postbacks and partial-page updates. 将使用控件来指定要更新的页面区域 。The regions of the page to be updated are designated by using controls. 控件处理异步回发并仅刷新必须更新的页面区域。The control handles the asynchronous postbacks and refreshes only the regions of the page that have to be updated. 有关部分页面呈现的详细信息，请参阅 [部分页呈现概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100))。For more information about partial-page rendering, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100)). 有关导致更新的条件的详细信息，请参阅 [UpdatePanel 控件概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386454(v=vs.100))。For more information about the conditions that cause an update, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386454(v=vs.100)). ## 结合使用 ScriptManager 控件和母版页、用户控件和其他子组件Using the ScriptManager Control with Master Pages, User Controls, and Other Child Components 一页 在其层次结构中只能包含一个控件。A page can contain only one control in its hierarchy. 若要在父页已有控件时为嵌套页、用户控件或组件注册服务和脚本， 请使用 控件。To register services and scripts for nested pages, user controls, or components when the parent page already has a control, use the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [将 UpdatePanel 控件与母版页一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398864(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Using the UpdatePanel Control with Master Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398864(v=vs.100)). ## 脚本管理和注册Script Management and Registration 控件使您可以注册随后呈现为该页一部分的脚本。The control enables you to register script that is then rendered as part of the page. 控制注册方法可分为以下三个类别：The control registration methods can be broken into the following three categories: - 保证在 Microsoft Ajax 库上维护脚本依赖项的注册方法。Registration methods that guarantee that script dependencies on the Microsoft Ajax Library are maintained. - 不依赖于 Microsoft Ajax 库，但与控件兼容的注册方法 。Registration methods that are not dependent on the Microsoft Ajax Library, but that are compatible with controls. - 支持使用控件的注册方法 。Registration methods that support working with controls. 有关如何在 ASP.NET 中创建和使用 Ajax 脚本的详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Microsoft Ajax Library 创建自定义客户端脚本](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386453(v=vs.100))。For more information about how to create and use Ajax script in ASP.NET, see [Creating Custom Client Script by Using the Microsoft Ajax Library](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386453(v=vs.100)). ### 注册依赖于 Microsoft Ajax 库的脚本Registering Script That Is Dependent on the Microsoft Ajax Library 你可以使用以下方法来注册脚本文件，以保证保留 Microsoft Ajax 库上的任何依赖项。You can use the following methods to register script files in a way that guarantees that any dependencies on the Microsoft Ajax Library are maintained. |方法Method|定义Definition| |------------|----------------| ||注册一个服务器控件，该控件实现 用于定义 [sys.databases](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/bb397516(v=vs.90)) 客户端对象的接口。Registers a server control that implements the interface that is used to define a [Sys.Component](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/bb397516(v=vs.90)) client object. 控件呈现支持客户端对象的脚本。The control renders script that supports the client object.| ||注册一个服务器控件，该控件实现 用于定义 [sys.databases](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/bb397516(v=vs.90)) 客户端对象的接口。Registers a server control that implements the interface that is used to define a [Sys.Component](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/bb397516(v=vs.90)) client object. 控件呈现支持客户端对象的脚本。The control renders script that supports the client object.| ### 注册部分页面更新兼容脚本Registering Partial-Page Update Compatible Scripts 你可以使用以下方法来注册不依赖于 Microsoft Ajax 库但与控件兼容的脚本文件 。You can use the following methods to register script files that are not dependent on the Microsoft Ajax Library but that are compatible with controls. 这些方法与控件的类似方法相对应 。These methods correspond to similar methods of the control. 如果要呈现在控件内使用的脚本 ，请确保调用控件的方法 。If you are rendering script for use inside an control, make sure that you call the methods of the control. |方法Method|定义Definition| |------------|----------------| ||向 JavaScript 数组添加一个值。Adds a value to a JavaScript array. 如果数组不存在，则创建它。If the array does not exist, it is created.| ||在 `script` 页面的开始标记之后呈现一个元素 `
` 。Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `` tag. 此脚本指定为字符串参数。The script is specified as a string parameter.| ||在 `script` 页面的开始标记之后呈现一个元素 `` 。Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `` tag. 脚本内容通过将 `src` 属性设置为指向脚本文件的 URL 来指定。The script content is specified by setting the `src` attribute to a URL that points to a script file.| ||在 `script` 页面的开始标记之后呈现一个元素 `` 。Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `` tag. 脚本内容是使用程序集中的资源名称指定的。The script content is specified with a resource name in an assembly. `src`通过调用从程序集检索命名脚本的 HTTP 处理程序，使用 URL 自动填充属性。The `src` attribute is automatically populated with a URL by a call to an HTTP handler that retrieves the named script from the assembly.| || (指定控件的标记中的 expando) 呈现自定义名称/值特性对。Renders a custom name/value attribute pair (an expando) in the markup for a specified control.| ||呈现隐藏的字段。Renders a hidden field.| ||注册为响应元素的事件而执行的脚本 `form` `submit` 。Registers a script that is executed in response to the `form` element's `submit` event. `onSubmit`特性引用指定的脚本。The `onSubmit` attribute references the specified script.| ||在页面的结束标记之前呈现启动脚本块 `` 。Renders a startup script block just before the page's closing `` tag. 要呈现的脚本指定为字符串参数。The script to render is specified as a string parameter.| 注册方法时，为该脚本指定类型/密钥对。When you register methods, you specify a type/key pair for that script. 如果已注册了具有相同类型/密钥对的脚本，则不会注册新的脚本。If a script with the same type/key pair is already registered, a new script is not registered. 同样，如果使用已存在的类型/资源名称对注册脚本，则 `script` 不会再次添加引用资源的元素。Similarly, if you register a script with a type/resource name pair that already exists, the `script` element that references the resource is not added again. 在注册以前注册的属性的 expando 特性时，将引发异常。When you register an expando attribute of a previously registered attribute, an exception is thrown. 允许重复注册数组值。Duplicate registration of array values is allowed. 当调用 或 方法时，请避免注册执行内联函数的脚本。When you call the or the method, avoid registering script that executes inline functions. 相反，注册包含函数定义（如事件处理程序）或应用程序的自定义类定义的脚本。Instead, register script that contains function definitions like event handlers or custom class definitions for your application. ### UpdatePanel 控件的注册方法Registration Methods for UpdatePanel Controls 使用控件时，可以使用以下方法自定义部分页面更新 。You can use the following methods to customize partial-page updates when you use controls. |方法Method|定义Definition| |------------|----------------| ||将控件注册为异步回发的触发器。Registers a control as a trigger for asynchronous postbacks.| ||在局部页面呈现期间将自定义数据发送到多个控件。Sends custom data to controls during partial-page rendering.| ||为控件内的控件注册释放脚本 。Registers a dispose script for a control that is inside an control. 在更新或删除 控件时会执行脚本。The script is executed when the control is updated or deleted. Dispose 方法用于作为 Microsoft Ajax 库一部分的客户端组件，并且在不再使用某个组件时必须释放资源。The dispose method is used for client components that are part of the Microsoft Ajax Library and that have to free resources when a component is no longer used.| ||将控件注册为完全回发的触发器。Registers a control as a trigger for a full postback. 此方法用于 控件内其他执行异步回发的控件。This method is used for controls inside an control that would otherwise perform asynchronous postbacks.| ## Web 服务引用Web Service References 通过创建 对象并将其添加到控件的集合，可以注册要从客户端脚本调用的 Web 服务 。You can register a Web service to be called from client script by creating a object and adding it to the collection of the control. ASP.NET 为集合中的每个对象生成一个客户端代理对象 。ASP.NET generates a client proxy object for each object in the collection. 可以通过编程方式将 对象添加到 集合，以便在运行时注册 Web 服务。You can programmatically add objects to the collection to register Web services at run time. 有关如何在脚本中访问 Web 服务的详细信息，请参阅在 [ASP.NET ajax 中向客户端脚本公开 Web 服务](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398998(v=vs.100)) 和 [通过 ASP.NET AJAX 中的客户端脚本调用 web 服务](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398995(v=vs.100))。For more information about how to access Web services in script, see [Exposing Web Services to Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398998(v=vs.100)) and [Calling Web Services from Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398995(v=vs.100)). ## 本地化Localization 控件在呈现的页面中生成指向相应的本地化脚本文件的引用，这些文件是嵌入在程序集或独立脚本文件中的脚本文件。The control generates references in the rendered page that point to the appropriate localized script files, which are either script files embedded in assemblies or stand-alone script files. 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，控件将 检索本地化的资源 (如当前区域性) 的本地化字符串（如果存在）。When the property is set to `true`, the control retrieves localized resources (such as localized strings) for the current culture, if they exist. 控件为使用本地化资源提供了以下功能：The control provides the following functionality for using localized resources: - **嵌入在程序集中的脚本文件**。**Script files that are embedded in an assembly**. 控件确定要发送到浏览器的区域性特定或回退区域性脚本文件。The control determines which culture-specific or fallback-culture script file to send to the browser. 它通过使用特定于区域性的 程序集特性、使用程序集打包的资源以及浏览器的 UI 区域性来执行此项 (如果有任何) 。It does this by using the culture-specific assembly attribute, the resources packaged with the assembly, and the UI culture of the browser (if any). - **独立的脚本文件**。**Stand-alone script files**. 控件定义使用对象的属性支持的 UI 区域性列表 。The control defines the list of UI cultures that are supported by using the property of the object. - **处于调试模式**。**In debug mode**. 控件尝试呈现包含调试信息的特定于区域性的脚本文件。The control tries to render a culture-specific script file that contains debug information. 例如，如果页处于调试模式，并且当前区域性设置为 en-MX，则该控件将呈现一个具有名称（如.en-MX.debug.js）的脚本文件 `scriptname` （如果该文件存在）。For example, if the page is in debug mode and the current culture is set to en-MX, the control renders a script file that has a name such as `scriptname`.en-MX.debug.js, if the file exists. 如果该文件不存在，则将呈现适当回退区域性的调试文件If the file does not exist, the debug file for the appropriate fallback culture is rendered 有关如何本地化资源的详细信息，请参阅 [为组件库本地化资源概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398937(v=vs.100))。For more information about how to localize resources, see [Localizing Resources for Component Libraries Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398937(v=vs.100)). ## 错误处理Error Handling 当异步回发期间出现页面错误时，将 引发事件。When a page error occurs during asynchronous postbacks, the event is raised. 服务器上的错误发送到客户端的方式取决于 Web.config 文件的属性、 属性和自定义错误部分。The way in which errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the property, the property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [为 UpdatePanel 控件自定义错误处理](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398934(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Customizing Error Handling for UpdatePanel Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398934(v=vs.100)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                          ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示了使用控件的不同方案 。The following examples show different scenarios for using the control. **启用部分页面更新****Enabling Partial-Page Updates** 下面的示例演示如何使用 控件启用部分页面更新。The following example shows how to use the control to enable partial-page updates. 在此示例中， 和 控件位于 控件中。In this example, a and a control are inside an control. 默认情况下，属性的值 为 ，并且属性的值 为 `true` 。By default, the value of the property is , and the value of the property is `true`. 因此，面板的子控件导致异步回发。Therefore, child controls of the panel cause an asynchronous postback. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample1CS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample1VB.aspx#1)] **处理部分页面更新错误并注册脚本****Handling Partial-Page Update Errors and Registering Script** 下面的示例演示如何在部分页面更新过程中提供自定义错误处理。The following example shows how to provide custom error handling during partial-page updates. 默认情况下，当在部分页更新期间发生错误时，将显示 JavaScript 消息框。By default, when an error occurs during partial-page updates, a JavaScript message box is displayed. 此示例演示如何通过提供事件的处理程序 并 在事件处理程序中设置属性，来使用自定义错误处理。This example demonstrates how to use custom error handling by providing a handler for the event, and by setting the property in the event handler. 还可以设置 属性，以指定在部分页面更新过程中发生错误时如何使用 Web.config 文件中的自定义错误部分。You can also set the property to specify how the custom errors section of the Web.config file is used when an error occurs during partial-page updates. 在此示例中，将使用属性的默认值 。In this example, the default value of the property is used. 这意味着，如果 Web.config 文件包含 [customErrors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/y123fsf7(v=vs.100)) 元素，该元素将确定如何显示错误。This means that if the Web.config file contains a [customErrors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/y123fsf7(v=vs.100)) element, that element determines how errors are displayed. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [CustomErrors 元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/y123fsf7(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [customErrors Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/y123fsf7(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError/VB/default.aspx#1)] **全球化浏览器中显示的日期和时间****Globalizing the Date and Time That Are Displayed in the Browser** 下面的示例演示如何设置属性， 以便客户端脚本可以在浏览器中显示特定于区域性的日期和时间。The following example shows how to set the property so that client script can display a culture-specific date and time in the browser. 在此示例中， `Culture` [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) 指令的特性设置为 `auto` 。In the example, the `Culture` attribute of the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive is set to `auto`. 因此，在当前浏览器设置中指定的第一种语言将确定页面的区域性和 UI 区域性。As a result, the first language that is specified in the current browser settings determines the culture and UI culture for the page. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：为 ASP.NET 网页全球化设置区域性和 UI 区域性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bz9tc508(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [How to: Set the Culture and UI Culture for ASP.NET Web Page Globalization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bz9tc508(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization/VB/default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化控件使用的内部字段 以跟踪页、控件和部署信息。This constructor initializes the internal fields that are used by the control to track page, control, and deployment information.

summary.span: 创建一个历史时间点，并将其添加到浏览器的历史记录堆栈中。

span.span: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些方法重载使你能够定义服务器状态，并且可以选择浏览器中历史记录项的标题。These method overloads enable you to define server state, and optionally the title of the history entry in the browser. 创建历史记录点时，会将序列化和加密的数据追加到网页的 URL，并在浏览器的历史记录堆栈中包含一个条目。When you create a history point, serialized and encrypted data is appended to the URL of the Web page and an entry is included in the browser's history stack. 当引发任何后续的服务器导航事件时，可以使用状态数据来重新创建页面。You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用服务器控件管理浏览器历史记录](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc488548(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc488548(v=vs.100)).

span.span: The text that will be added to the browser's history stack as the title for this state.

summary.span: 使用指定的状态数据集合和状态标题创建历史时间点，然后将它添加到浏览器的历史记录堆栈中。

span.span: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack, using the specified state data collection and state title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要为状态数据保存多个键/值对，请使用此方法创建历史记录点。Use this method to create a history point when you want to save more than one key/value pair for the state data. 创建历史记录点时，会将序列化和加密的数据追加到网页的 URL，并在浏览器的历史记录堆栈中包含一个条目。When you create a history point, serialized and encrypted data is appended to the URL of the Web page and an entry is included in the browser's history stack. 如果 `title` 参数为，则将网页 `null` 标题用作历史记录堆栈中状态条目的标题。If the `title` parameter is `null`, the title of the Web page is used as the title of the state entry in the history stack. 当引发任何后续的服务器导航事件时，可以使用状态数据来重新创建页面。You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用服务器控件管理浏览器历史记录](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc488548(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc488548(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示能否从客户端脚本调用 ASP.NET 页中公共静态页方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether public static page methods in an ASP.NET page can be called from client script.

value.span: 如果可以从客户端脚本将 ASP.NET 页上的静态页方法作为 Web 方法调用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if static page methods on an ASP.NET page can be called from client script as Web methods; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将静态页面方法添加到 ASP.NET 页面，并将其标记为 Web 方法。You can add static page methods to an ASP.NET page and mark them as Web methods. 然后，可以从脚本中调用这些方法，就好像它们是 Web 服务的一部分，而不创建单独的 .asmx 文件。You can then call these methods from script as if they were part of a Web service, but without creating a separate .asmx file. 若要在页面上创建 Web 方法，请导入 命名空间，并将 特性添加到要公开的每个静态方法。To create Web methods on a page, import the namespace and add a attribute to each static method that you want to expose. 这些方法必须标记为公共。The methods must be marked public. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在 ASP.NET AJAX 中向客户端脚本公开 Web 服务](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398998(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Exposing Web Services to Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398998(v=vs.100)).

span.span: if partial rendering is enabled and full-page updates are suppressed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使 属性是 `true` ，部分页面呈现也可能不会发生。Even if the property is `true`, partial-page rendering might not occur. 浏览器可能不支持部分页面呈现，或 属性设置为 `false` 。The browser might not support partial-page rendering, or the property is set to `false`. 可以 在运行时或在页面事件发生之前重写属性的值 。You can override the value of the property at run time during or before the page's event. 如果在页面事件发生后尝试更改此属性 ，则 会引发异常。If you try to change this property after the page's event has occurred, an exception is thrown.

exception.span: 发生页面的 事件后，设置 属性。

span.span: The property is set after the page's event occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，全球化 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 函数，例如 `Date.localeFormat` 方法显示特定于区域性的信息。When the property is set to `true`, globalized ECMAScript (JavaScript) functions such as the `Date.localeFormat` method display culture-specific information. 可以在浏览器、服务器代码或网站的配置文件中设置区域性。The culture can be set in the browser, in server code, or in the Web site's configuration file.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control renders localized versions of script files.

value.span: 如果将呈现本地化脚本文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if localized script files will be rendered; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ， 对象将检索当前区域性的脚本文件（如果存在）。When the property is set to `true`, the object will retrieve script files for the current culture if they exist. 例如，页可能指定名为 CustomScript.js 的脚本文件。For example, a page might specify a script file that is named CustomScript.js. 如果将区域性设置为 fr-CA，则 对象将尝试检索名为 CustomScript.fr-CA.js 的脚本文件。If the culture is set to fr-CA, the object will try to retrieve a script file that is named CustomScript.fr-CA.js. > [!NOTE] > 若要防止脚本文件被呈现两次，则不能在 异步回发过程中修改属性。To prevent a script file from being rendered two times, the property must not be modified during an asynchronous postback.

summary.span: 获取一个值，它指示是否将呈现客户端脚本库的调试版本。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the debug versions of client script libraries will be rendered.

value.span: 如果要在调试模式下执行当前请求，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current request is executing in debug mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `false` 当满足下列任一条件时，属性将返回：The property returns `false` when any one of the following conditions is true: - 在配置文件的 [deployment](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228298(v%3dvs.100)) 元素中， `retail` 特性设置为 `true` 。In the [deployment](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228298(v%3dvs.100)) element of the configuration file, the `retail` attribute is set to `true`. 这将覆盖所有其他设置。This overrides all other settings. - 属性设置为 `Auto` 或 `Inherit` ，并且在 `compilation` 应用程序根 Web.config 文件的部分未启用调试。The property is set to `Auto` or to `Inherit`, and debugging is not enabled in the `compilation` section of the application-root Web.config file. - 将 属性设置为 `Release`。The property is set to `Release`. > [!NOTE] > `debug` [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令的属性不影响启用了 Ajax 的 ASP.NET 应用程序。The `debug` attribute of the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive does not affect Ajax-enabled ASP.NET applications. 控件仅使用 Web.config 文件中的设置以及其和属性中的设置 来确定是否呈现调试脚本。The control uses only the settings in the Web.config file and in its and properties to determine whether to render debug scripts. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [调试和跟踪 Ajax 应用程序概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398817(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Debugging and Tracing Ajax Applications Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398817(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定如何 相对于页面 UI 的标记加载集合中的脚本。The property determines how scripts in the collection are loaded relative to the markup for the page UI. 当 属性为时 `true` ，在 `script` 加载页面的 UI 标记之前，将呈现一个元素。When the property is `true`, a `script` element is rendered before the page's UI markup is loaded. 在这种情况下，如果 UI 元素是在脚本中定义的，则 UI 将在加载时完全正常运行。In this scenario, if UI elements are defined in scripts, the UI will be fully functional when it loads. 但是，如果脚本访问标记中尚未创建实例的 UI 元素，则可能会发生错误。However, if the script accesses UI elements in the markup for which instances have not yet been created, an error might occur. 若要确保 UI 元素在访问之前加载，请处理 `load` 类的事件 `Sys.Application` 。To make sure that UI elements are loaded before you access them, handle the `load` event of the `Sys.Application` class. 当 属性为时 `false` ，在 `script` 呈现页面的 UI 标记后，将呈现一个元素。When the property is `false`, a `script` element is rendered after the page's UI markup is rendered. 在这种情况下，UI 加载速度更快，但如果定义其他 UI 元素的脚本尚未完成加载，则它可能无法完全正常运行。In this scenario, the UI loads more quickly, but it might not be fully functional if scripts that define additional UI elements have not finished loading. `true`如果已将设置为，则不要将此属性设置为 `true` 。Do not set this property to `true` if you set to `true` already.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击浏览器的 " **后退** " 按钮时，浏览器将导航到以前查看过的 url，其中可能包括包含历史记录点状态数据的 url。When a user clicks the browser's **Back** button, the browser navigates through previously-viewed URLs, which can include URLs that contain history-point state data. 如果网页中的客户端代码检测到 URL 包含历史记录状态数据，则会向服务器页发出请求。If client code in the Web page detects that the URL contains history state data, it makes a request to the server page. 这作为回发事件， 服务器控件引发 `Navigate` 事件。This acts as a postback event, and the server control raises the `Navigate` event. 可以通过使用随事件传递的状态数据来处理此事件，并根据需要在 Web 应用程序中重新创建页面。You can handle this event and re-create the page as required in the Web application by using the state data that is passed with the event.

span.span: Registers an ECMAScript (JavaScript) array declaration with the control for use with a control that is inside an control, and adds the array to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可注册与部分页面呈现兼容且没有 Microsoft Ajax 库依赖项的客户端脚本数组。You use the method to register a client script array that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no Microsoft Ajax Library dependencies. 当表示正在更新的控件内的控件时，此方法将注册此数组 `control` 。This method registers the array when `control` represents a control that is inside an control that is being updated. 若要在每次发生异步回发时都注册数组，请使用 此方法的重载。To register an array every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the overload of this method. 如果要注册不与部分页更新相关的数组，并且想要在初始页面呈现期间只注册一次数组，请使用 类的方法 。If you want to register an array that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the array only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 可以 从页的属性中获取对该对象的引用 。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. 方法确定是否已注册了具有在参数中指定的名称的数组 `arrayName` 。The method determines whether an array with the name that is specified in the `arrayName` parameter is already registered. 如果是这样，则方法将添加在中指定的值 `arrayValue` 。If so, the method adds the values specified in `arrayValue`. 由于要注册的数组基于 类，因此允许重复项。Because the array to be registered is based on the class, duplicates are allowed. 如果中不存在具有名称的已注册数组，则会 `arrayName` 创建数组，并将中的值 `arrayValue` 添加到该数组。If a registered array with the name in `arrayName` does not exist, the array is created and the values in `arrayValue` are added to it. 若要在数组中包含字符串，请在中使用单引号 ( ") 或转义双引号 (\\ " ) `arrayValue` 。To include string literals in the array, use single quotation marks (') or escaped double quotation marks (\\") in `arrayValue`. 请注意，JavaScript 将逗号 (，) 为数组中的分隔符。Note that JavaScript treats a comma (,) as a delimiter in an array. 通过在中传递以逗号分隔的字符串，可以指定多个数组值 `arrayValue` 。You can specify multiple array values by passing a comma-delimited string in `arrayValue`. 用逗号分隔两个项 `arrayValue` 等效于对 每个项调用方法两次。Separating two items with a comma in `arrayValue` is equivalent to calling the method two times, one time for each item.

span.span: Registers a control as a trigger for asynchronous postbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够将 Web 服务器控件注册为触发器，以便它们执行异步回发而不是同步回发。The method enables you to register Web server controls as triggers so that they perform an asynchronous postback instead of a synchronous postback. 如果将 控件的属性 设置为 `true` 默认) (，则控件内的回发控件 将自动注册为异步回发控件。When the property of an control is set to `true` (which is the default), postback controls inside the control are automatically registered as asynchronous postback controls. 使用 方法可将控件外的控件注册 为异步回发的触发器，并可能会更新更新面板的内容。Use the method to register controls outside an control as triggers for asynchronous postbacks, and to potentially update the content of an update panel. 若要以 编程方式更新控件，请调用 方法。To update an control programmatically, call the method. 您可以使用控件的元素以声明方式添加触发器 `Triggers` 。You can add the trigger declaratively by using the `Triggers` element of the control. 在 Visual Studio 中，使用设计器的 " **UpdatePanelTrigger 集合编辑器** " 对话框。In Visual Studio, use the designer's **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用 方法来注册 控件，以便更新 控件的内容。The following example shows how to call the method to register a control so that it causes an update of an control's content. 控件不在 控件内。The control is not inside the control. 将显示两个按钮： `Button1` 和 `Button2` 。Two buttons are shown: `Button1` and `Button2`. `Button1` 刷新面板的内容并 `Button2` 刷新整个页面。`Button1` refreshes the content of the panel, and `Button2` refreshes the whole page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/CS/ScriptManager1CS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/VB/ScriptManager1VB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何调用 方法以注册用户控件，使其可以更新 控件的内容。The following example shows how to call the method to register a user control so that it causes an update of an control's content. 第一个示例演示使用用户控件的页。The first example shows a page using the user control. 第二个示例演示用户控件。The second example shows the user control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/CS/ScriptManager2CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/VB/ScriptManager2VB.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 异步回发过程中，使用方法将数据从服务器发送到客户端，而不管接收数据的控件是否在控件中 。You use the method to send data from the server to the client during asynchronous postbacks, regardless of whether the control receiving the data is inside an control. 如果 `dataItem` 为注册的参数 `control` 未序列化为 JSON，请将 `isJsonSerialized` 参数设置为 `false` 。If the `dataItem` parameter that you register for `control` is not serialized as JSON, set the `isJsonSerialized` parameter to `false`. 这就不必为 `eval` 发送到客户端的每个字符串使用函数。This avoids the need to use the `eval` function for each string that is sent to the client. 有关 JSON 格式的详细信息，请参阅 [json 网站简介](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297) 。For more information about the JSON format, see the [Introducing JSON](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297) Web site. 只能在异步回发期间调用方法。The method can be called only during an asynchronous postback. 若要确定回发是否是异步的，请使用 属性。To determine whether a postback is asynchronous, use the property. 在 `pageLoading` 对象的、和事件期间，可以在客户端脚本中访问通过使用方法注册的数据项 `pageLoaded` `endRequest` `PageRequestManager` 。The data items that are registered by using the method can be accessed in client script during the `pageLoading`, `pageLoaded`, and `endRequest` events of the `PageRequestManager` object. 处理这些事件时，将在事件参数对象中传递自定义数据。When you handle these events, the custom data is passed in an event argument object. 例如，如果为事件提供处理程序，则 `pageLoading` 会在类中传递自定义数据 `PageLoadingEventArgs` ，该类将公开一个属性。For example, if you provide a handler for the `pageLoading` event, the custom data is passed in the `PageLoadingEventArgs` class, which exposes a property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 异步回发期间将数据发送到页面上的两个控件。The following example shows how to send data to two controls on a page during an asynchronous postback. 控件不在 控件内。The controls are not inside an control. 此示例显示不采用参数的重载 `isJsonSerialized` 。This example shows the overload that does not take the `isJsonSerialized` parameter. 否则，检索对象的属性的过程与 `dataItems` `PageLoadingEventArgs` 不使用该重载时相同。Otherwise, the procedure for retrieving the `dataItems` property of the `PageLoadingEventArgs` object is the same as if you did not use that overload. > [!NOTE] > 在此示例中发送的数据仅用于说明。The data that is sent in this example is for illustration only. 在实际应用程序中，可以使用 方法从服务器发送自定义数据。In a real-world application, you would use the method to send custom data from the server. 例如，您可以使用数据项发送有关是否隐藏或显示不在控件内的客户端元素的信息 。For example, you could use the data item to send information about whether to hide or show client elements that are not inside an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem/CS/ScriptManagerRegisterDataItemCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem/VB/ScriptManagerRegisterDataItemVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The script is executed when the control is updated or deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法为 `dispose` 控件内的控件注册脚本 。Use the method to register `dispose` scripts for controls that are inside an control. 在异步回发过程中， 可以更新、删除或创建控件。During asynchronous postbacks, controls can be updated, deleted, or created. 更新或删除面板时，为 `dispose` 中的控件注册的所有脚本 将被调用。When a panel is updated or deleted, any `dispose` scripts that are registered for controls that are inside the are called. 在典型的页开发方案中，您不必调用 方法。In typical page development scenarios, you do not have to call the method. 方法旨在供控件开发人员用来注册脚本，或创建从接口继承的控件 。The method is intended for use by control developers to register script or create controls that inherit from the interface. 例如， `dispose` 如果您通过使用撰写来开发客户端控件，则可以使用脚本。For example, you might use a `dispose` script if you develop a client control by using composition. 在控件中，实现 并呈现单个控件。In your control, you implement and render individual controls. 注册与 `dispose` 定义的客户端组件（如）不对应的任何项的方法 `Sys.TextBox` 。You register the `dispose` method of any item that does not correspond to a defined client component such as `Sys.TextBox`. 如果自定义控件组合了与 Microsoft Ajax 库中的客户端组件相对应的元素，则无需注册 `dispose` 脚本，因为 `dispose` 会自动调用。If your custom control composes elements that correspond to client components in the Microsoft Ajax Library, you do not have to register a `dispose` script, because `dispose` is called automatically. 因此，将 方法用于作为 Microsoft Ajax 库一部分的客户端组件，并且在不再使用某个组件时必须释放资源。Therefore, use the method for client components that are part of the Microsoft Ajax Library and that have to free resources when a component is no longer used. 对于控件，可以多次调用方法。The method can be called multiple times for a control. 聚合多个脚本。Multiple scripts are aggregated. 释放脚本的顺序与脚本的注册顺序相匹配。The order of disposing scripts matches the order in which the scripts were registered. 如果为 `dispose` 不在控件中的控件注册脚本 ，则会引发异常。If you register a `dispose` script for a control that is not in an control, an exception is thrown. 在 `dispose` 类的和事件之间调用该脚本 `pageLoading` `pageLoaded` `PageRequestManager` 。The `dispose` script is called between the `pageLoading` and `pageLoaded` events of the `PageRequestManager` class.

span.span: Registers a name/value pair with the control as a custom (expando) attribute of a specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可为与部分页面呈现兼容且没有 Microsoft Ajax 库依赖项的控件注册自定义 (expando) 属性。You use the method to register a custom (expando) property for a control that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no Microsoft Ajax Library dependencies. 方法将名称/值对注册为指定控件的自定义特性。The method registers a name/value pair as a custom attribute for the specified control. 该属性是从 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 动态设置的，以保留呈现控件标记的 XHTML 兼容性。The property is set dynamically from ECMAScript (JavaScript) to preserve XHTML compatibility for the rendered control's markup. `encode` `true` 如果必须对动态属性的值中的任何字符进行转义，则设置为。Set `encode` to `true` if you have to escape any characters in the dynamic property's value. 如果未找到动态属性将添加到的控件，则会出现脚本错误。If the control to which the dynamic property will be added is not found, a script error occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily for use by control developers. 在 其事件处理程序中从自定义 ASP.NET Ajax 扩展程序控件调用方法， `onInit` 以将该控件注册到页面。Call the method from a custom ASP.NET Ajax extender control during its `onInit` event handler to register that control with the page. 必须注册 ASP.NET Ajax 扩展程序控件，才能参与部分页面呈现。An ASP.NET Ajax extender control must be registered to participate in partial-page rendering. 方法将指定的扩展程序控件添加到扩展程序控件的内部列表和它们扩展的目标脚本控件。The method adds the specified extender control to an internal list of extender controls and the target script controls they extend. 此列表在事件期间进行处理 。This list is processed during the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加在提交窗体之前执行的脚本，该脚本允许你修改或取消该提交。The adds script that is executed before the form is submitted, which lets you modify the submission or cancel it. 使用 方法可呈现 `onsubmit` 与部分页面呈现兼容且没有 Microsoft Ajax 库依赖项的语句。You use the method to render an `onsubmit` statement that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no Microsoft Ajax Library dependencies. 仅当注册语句的控件位于正在更新的控件中时，才会将使用此方法注册的 JavaScript 代码发送到页面 。JavaScript code that is registered by using this method is sent to the page only when the control that is registering the statement is inside an control that is being updated. 若要在每次异步回发时注册代码，请使用 此方法的重载。To register code with every asynchronous postback, use the overload of this method. 如果要注册不与部分页更新相关的 JavaScript 代码，并且在初始页面呈现期间只需注册一次代码，请使用 类的方法 。If you want to register JavaScript code that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the code only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 可以 从页的属性中获取对该对象的引用 。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. 该方法的 *脚本* 参数 可包含多个脚本命令，这些命令使用分号 (; ) 进行分隔。The *script* parameter of the method can contain multiple script commands that are delimited by using semicolons (;). 有关 HTML 窗体和事件的详细信息 `onsubmit` ，请参阅 [ (W3C) 网站万维网联合会](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information about HTML forms and the `onsubmit` event, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法注册 JavaScript 代码会导致在每次发生异步回发时都包含脚本。Registering JavaScript code with this method causes the script to be included every time that an asynchronous postback occurs. > [!NOTE] > 不会删除任何较早的异步回发中的代码。Code from any earlier asynchronous postbacks is not removed. 新的异步回发将代码追加到语句的任何现有代码 `onsubmit` 。New asynchronous postbacks append code to any existing code for the `onsubmit` statement. 若要为控件内的控件注册代码 ，以便仅在更新控件时注册代码 ，请使用 此方法的重载。To register code for a control that is inside an control so that the code is registered only when the control is updated, use the overload of this method. 如果要注册不与部分页更新相关的 JavaScript 代码，并且在初始页面呈现期间只需注册一次代码，请使用 类的方法 。If you want to register JavaScript code that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the code only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 可以 从页的属性中获取对该对象的引用 。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page.

span.span: This method is used to configure postback controls inside an control that would otherwise perform asynchronous postbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法在控件内将回发控件注册 为触发器。Use the method to register postback controls inside an control as triggers. 使用此方法注册的控件更新整个页面，而不是仅更新 控件的内容。Controls that are registered by using this method update a whole page instead of updating only the control's content. 在控件之外使用此方法注册回发控件 不会产生任何影响，因为默认情况下，这些控件不会执行异步回发。Registering a postback control with this method outside an control has no affect because by default these controls do not perform asynchronous postbacks. 您可以使用控件的元素以声明方式添加触发器 `Triggers` 。You can add the trigger declaratively by using the `Triggers` element of the control. 在 Visual Studio 中，使用设计器的 " **UpdatePanelTrigger 集合编辑器** " 对话框。In Visual Studio, use the designer's **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box.

span.span: Registers a startup script block for a control that is inside an by using the control, and adds the script block to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法来注册与部分页面呈现兼容且没有 Microsoft Ajax 库依赖项的页的启动脚本块。You use the method to register a startup script block for a page that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no Microsoft Ajax Library dependencies. 仅当正在更新的控件在正在更新的控件中时，才会将使用此方法注册的启动脚本块发送到页面 。Startup script blocks that are registered by using this method are sent to the page only when the control that is registering the block is inside an control that is being updated. 若要在每次发生异步回发时注册一个启动脚本块，请使用 此方法的重载。To register a startup script block every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the overload of this method. 如果要注册的启动脚本与部分页面更新不相关，并且要在初始页面呈现期间只注册一次脚本，请使用 类的方法 。If you want to register a startup script that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 可以 从页的属性中获取对该对象的引用 。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. 当页面完成加载但在引发页面的客户端事件之前，将执行由方法呈现的脚本块 `onload` 。The script block that is rendered by the method executes when the page finishes loading but before the page's client `onload` event is raised. 启动脚本块位于标记之前呈现的 ASP.NET 页面的底部 `` 。Startup script blocks are located at the bottom of the rendered ASP.NET page just before the `` tag. 不保证使用注册的启动脚本块 的输出顺序与它们的注册顺序相同。Startup script blocks that are registered by using are not guaranteed to be output in the same order in which they are registered. 如果启动脚本块的顺序很重要，则使用 对象以单个字符串的形式收集脚本块，然后将它们全部注册为一个启动脚本。If the order of the startup script blocks is important, use a object to gather the script blocks in a single string, and then register them all as a single startup script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定 控件应呈现客户端脚本库的调试版本还是发布版本。The property specifies whether the control should render debug or release versions of client script libraries. 此值可由配置文件和页面指令中设置的值取代。This value can be superseded by values that are set in the configuration file and in the page directive. 下表列出了此属性的有效值。The following table lists the valid values for this property. |值Value|定义Definition| |-----------|----------------| ||当 `retail` [部署](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228298(v%3dvs.100)) 配置元素的属性设置为时，将在网页中使用客户端脚本库的调试版本 `false` 。Debug versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page when the `retail` attribute of the [deployment](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228298(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element is set to `false`. 否则，将使用客户端脚本库的发行版。Otherwise, the release versions of client script libraries are used.| ||当应用于 对象的属性时 ，此值与相同 。When applied to the property of the object, this value is the same as .| ||除非将 `retail` [部署](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228298(v%3dvs.100)) 配置元素的属性设置为，否则将在网页中使用客户端脚本库的调试版本 `true` 。Debug versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page unless the `retail` attribute of the [deployment](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228298(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element is set to `true`.| ||除非将 `retail` [部署](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228298(v%3dvs.100)) 配置元素的属性设置为，否则将在网页中使用客户端脚本库的发布版本 `false` 。Release versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page unless the `retail` attribute of the [deployment](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228298(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element is set to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > `debug` [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令的属性不影响启用了 Ajax 的 ASP.NET 应用程序。The `debug` attribute of the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive does not affect Ajax-enabled ASP.NET applications. 控件仅使用 Web.config 文件中的设置以及其和属性中的设置 来确定是否呈现调试脚本。The control uses only the settings in the Web.config file and in its and properties to determine whether to render debug scripts. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [调试和跟踪 Ajax 应用程序概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398817(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Debugging and Tracing Ajax Applications Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398817(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以为页面上的所有脚本块指定绝对、相对或应用程序的相对 URL。The property enables you to specify an absolute, relative, or application-relative URL for all script blocks on the page. 这包括向当前实例注册的自定义和第三方脚本块 。This includes custom and third-party script blocks that are registered with the current instance. 通常以声明方式将属性设置为 `ScriptManager` 页上元素的属性，但也可以在代码中对其进行设置。The property is typically set declaratively as an attribute of a `ScriptManager` element on the page, but it can be set in code also. 如果为 `path` 集合中的对象设置了属性或属性 ，则路径值会替代 该实例的值 。If the `path` attribute or the property is set for a object in the collection, the path value overrides the value for that instance. 如果未 指定任何值，则 控件会搜索属性定义的目录， 并按或属性解析脚本引用 。If no value is specified, the control searches the directory that is defined by the property and resolves script references by their or properties.

summary.span: 获取一个 对象。

span.span: Gets a object.

value.span: 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态 属性返回一个 对象，该对象可以包含映射集合，这些映射表示脚本资源 (脚本重定向) 的位置。The static property returns a object that can contain a collection of mappings that represent the location of the script resource (script redirection). 可以根据名称或名称/程序集对映射此映射集合，并将其指向一个 对象。This collection of mappings can be mapped based on names or name/assembly pairs, and it can point to a object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加对象 ，该对象可由 对象引用。The following examples shows how to add a object that can be referenced by a object. 在事件中将以下代码添加到 global.asax 文件中 `Application_Start` 。Add the following code to the Global.asax file in the `Application_Start` event. ```csharp ScriptResourceDefinition myScriptResDef = new ScriptResourceDefinition(); myScriptResDef.Path = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.min.js"; myScriptResDef.DebugPath = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.js"; myScriptResDef.CdnPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.min.js"; myScriptResDef.CdnDebugPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.js"; ScriptManager.ScriptResourceMapping.AddDefinition("jquery", null, myScriptResDef); ``` ```vb Dim myScriptResDef As New ScriptResourceDefinition() myScriptResDef.Path = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.min.js" myScriptResDef.DebugPath = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.js" myScriptResDef.CdnPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.min.js" myScriptResDef.CdnDebugPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.js" ScriptManager.ScriptResourceMapping.AddDefinition("jquery", Nothing, myScriptResDef) ``` 在 ASP.NET Web 窗体页的标记) ( .aspx 文件中，在 `form` 元素内以及使用 jQuery 脚本的任何元素或代码之前添加以下标记。In the markup for an ASP.NET Web Forms page (.aspx file), add the following markup inside the `form` element and before any elements or code that uses jQuery script. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取一个包含 对象（每个对象表示一个呈现给客户端的脚本文件）的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that contains the objects, each of which represents a script file rendered to the client.

value.span: 实例的 对象。

span.span: The object of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象是对象的集合 ，其中每个对象都表示一个脚本文件。The object that is returned by this property is a collection of objects, each of which represents a script file. 集合包括对 ASP.NET 的所有脚本文件的引用，这些文件对 Ajax 功能和自定义脚本文件都是必需的。The collection includes references to all the script files that ASP.NET needs for Ajax functionality, and to custom script files. 可在 控件或关联控件中定义要呈现的自定义脚本文件 。Custom script files to render can be defined in the control or in an associated control. 可以通过将元素添加到页面中元素内的节点，将脚本文件添加到标记中的集合 `asp:ScriptReference` `Scripts` `asp:ScriptManager` ，如以下示例中所示。You can add script files to the collection in markup by adding `asp:ScriptReference` elements to a `Scripts` node inside the `asp:ScriptManager` element on the page, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 你还可以 使用类的方法以编程方式将对象添加到集合中 。You can also add a object to the collection programmatically by using the method of the class. 控件在控件事件期间注册脚本文件 。The control registers script files during the control's event. 集合不包含核心 Microsoft Ajax Library 脚本。The collection does not contain the core Microsoft Ajax Library scripts. 核心库中的脚本会自动呈现;无需向控件注册这些 控件。The scripts in the core library are rendered automatically; they do not have to be registered with the control. 但是，如果您想要替代核心脚本或任何控制脚本并替换不同版本的脚本，则可以将您的版本添加到集合中 。However, if you want to override a core script or any control script and substitute a different version of the script, you can add your version to the collection.

summary.span: 将浏览器焦点设置为由 ID 指定的控件。

span.span: Sets the browser focus to the control specified by ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的工作方式类似于 类的方法 。The method works like the method for the class. 这两种方法都使具有指定 ID 的控件成为网页上的活动控件。Both methods make the control with the specified ID the active control on the Web page. 类的方法 用于在异步回发过程中设置焦点。The method of the class is used to set focus during an asynchronous postback. 在回发期间以及第一次呈现页面时， 方法将调用 类的方法 。During postbacks and when the page is first rendered, the method calls the method of the class. 如果有多个对方法的调用 ，则最后一个调用中的控件将接收焦点。If there are multiple calls to the method, the control in the last call receives focus.
